text: George Hannauer circa 1915 George A. Hannauer (December 19, 1872 - November 2, 1929) was the president of the Boston and Maine Railroad. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He died in New Haven, Connecticut, of a heart attack while attending the Yale-Dartmouth football game. ==References== Category:1872 births Category:1929 deaths Category:Boston and Maine Railroad Category:Businesspeople from St. Louis
title: George Hannauer
